t: Kirkland Signature
s: In 1995 Costco began the Kirkland Signature line after recognizing a need for better quality goods at a lower price. Our mission was simple: Create an item of the same – or better – quality than the leading brand at a lower price, and do so by controlling every element of the item’s creation, ...
